ack.p: The findings and conclusions in this report are those of the authors and do not necessarily represent the official position of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) or the Human Sciences Research Council of South Africa (HSRC). The use of trade names is for identification purposes only and does not constitute endorsement by the CDC, the Department of Health and Human Services or the HSRC. This work was initiated through a CDC Headquarters Experience and Technical Assistance (HETA) Fellowship to EI and hosted by SG. We thank Patrick Nadol (CDC South Africa) for many helpful comments, and Getahun Aynalem and Kassahun Ayalew (CDC South Africa) for their input on data sources.
